function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Startups relying heavily on relational capabilities may lead to increased risk of disease propagation through close contact and interaction with partners and the startup community.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread within the startup community and partner networks, potential for outbreaks and increased transmission of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, encourage remote work where possible, and limit in-person interaction to essential activities. Adhere to government health guidelines and restrictions.","Technologies":"Remote communication and collaboration tools, contact tracing apps, and health screening technologies.","People":"Founders, employees, partners, and members of the startup community.","Owner":"Startup management, health and safety officers, and government health authorities."},{"Description":"Perceived mismatch between startup characteristics and government support services can lead to a lack of access to necessary resources for maintaining health and safety standards.","Impact":"Inability to access essential resources for maintaining health and safety standards, increased risk of disease spread within startup organizations and communities.","Mitigation":"Advocate for tailored government support for startups, streamline support applications, and provide alternative resources for startups that do not meet traditional criteria. Seek support from industry associations and community organizations.","Technologies":"Digital support platforms, mobile applications for accessing support, and AI-driven eligibility assessment tools.","People":"Founders, employees, and startups excluded from traditional support programs.","Owner":"Startup management, industry associations, and government policy-makers."},{"Description":"Cognizance of customers' shifting needs may lead to increased risk of disease spread if startups are unable to adapt and respond to changes in customer behavior.","Impact":"Inability to meet customer needs and adhere to health and safety guidelines, potential for increased customer interaction leading to disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Adapt business models for remote service delivery, implement contactless payment systems, and prioritize customer and employee safety in all business operations. Provide online resources and communication channels for customers to reduce in-person interactions.","Technologies":"Virtual service platforms, contactless payment systems, online customer support tools.","People":"Founders, employees, and customers of startups.","Owner":"Startup management, customer support teams, and government health authorities."}]}
